oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Saccharide complexes of lanthanides
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAO, CP
DAS, TM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: biologically important ligands
hydroxy-containing compounds
d-glucuronic acid
crystal-structure
d-glucose
metal-ions
d-fructose
d-ribose
d-galactose
in-vitro
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The main focus of this review article is to bring out different aspects of interactions of saccharides with lanthanide ions. Various characteristic properties of lanthanide-saccharide complexes have been compared appropriately with those of the transition metal ones.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION A-INORGANIC BIO-INORGANIC PHYSICAL THEORETICAL & ANALYTICAL CHEMISTRY,42(2)227-239
